context.description: This page helps you select what type of target site you wish to connect the project to.

This page helps you import a project set from a file on the filesystem. A project set is a lightweight description of a set of shared projects. It can be used to reconstruct a lineup of shared projects that you have in your workspace.

This page helps you export a project set to a file which can be shared with other team members. A project set is a lightweight description of a set of shared projects. It can be used to reconstruct a lineup of shared projects that you have in your workspace.
This page helps you select a site to which your project should be connected. You may choose from the list of existing sites, or create a new site.
This page helps you choose the folder on the seected site where your project should be connected. You may choose an existing folder, or create a new folder.

You may wish to exclude certain resources from version control. Resources whose names match any enabled pattern will not be released. The wildcard characters '*' and '?' are permitted. These settings will not affect resources already under version control.
Downloads the selected resources from the site into your workspace.
Uploads the selected resources from your workspace to the site.
Show any differences between the local and remote site state of the selected resources in the Synchronize view.
Downloads the selected resources from the site into your workspace. You may specify the local name of the resources.
Downloads the selected resources from the site into your workspace. A project is created in the workspace for each of the selected items.
Discards the selected target sites from the list of remembered sites.
This view shows incoming, outgoing and conflicting changes.
Downloads the selected resources from the site into your workspace.
Uploads the selected resources from your workspace to the site.
The Site Explorer view allows you to browse of the contents of known target sites and download remote resources into the local workspace.
Creates a new target site to which you can upload or download resources.
Creates a new folder on the target site.
Refreshes the contents of the view.
Fully expands all selected items.
Removes the selected items from the Synchronize view.
Selects and reveals the selected items in the Navigator view.
